text: de the following:               - Surgery to remove the cancer.       - Radiofrequency ablation or cryosurgical ablation, if the cancer cannot be removed by surgery.             - If the cancer mostly affects the liver and the patient has severe symptoms from hormones or from the size of tumor, treatment may include:               -  Hepatic arterial occlusion, with or without systemic chemotherapy.      -  Chemoembolization, with or without systemic chemotherapy.
